control.controller

Class MouseMovementAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • control.controller.MouseMovementAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WindowResizer

    public abstract class MouseMovementAdapter
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
    Define a MouseAdapter that can re-dispatch events to the main frame in order to make the WindowResizer work in every case
    Author:
    Daphnis
    See Also:
    WindowResizer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static javax.swing.JFrame MAIN_FRAME
      The frame where the events should be re-dispatched
      private boolean reDispatch
      Tell whether the events needs to be re-dispatched or not

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MouseMovementAdapter()
      Create an new MouseMovementAdapter that will always re-dispatch events
      MouseMovementAdapter(boolean redispatch)
      Create a MouseMovementAdapter where it is possible to choose whether to re-dispatch the events to the main frame or just use them as they should be by default

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mouseClicked(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Override MouseAdapter mouseClicked method and make it final so the user of the class cannot redefine it and are obliged to use onMouseClicked
      void mouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Override MouseAdapter mouseDragged method and make it final so the user of the class cannot redefine it and are obliged to use onMouseDragged

      Override MouseAdapter mouseEntered method and make it final so the user of the class cannot redefine it and are obliged to use onMouseEntered
      void mouseExited(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Override MouseAdapter mouseExited method and make it final so the user of the class cannot redefine it and are obliged to use onMouseExited
      void mouseMoved(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Override MouseAdapter mouseMoved method and make it final so the user of the class cannot redefine it and are obliged to use onMouseMoved

      Override MouseAdapter mousePressed method and make it final so the user of the class cannot redefine it and are obliged to use onMousePressed
      void mouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Override MouseAdapter mouseReleased method and make it final so the user of the class cannot redefine it and are obliged to use onMouseReleased
      void mouseWheelMoved(java.awt.event.MouseWheelEvent e)
      Override MouseAdapter mouseWheelMoved method and make it final so the user of the class cannot redefine it and are obliged to use onMouseWheelMoved

      Called when there is a mouseClicked event Can be overridden in the subclasses
      void onMouseDragged(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Called when there is a mouseDragged event Can be overridden in the subclasses

      Called when there is a mouseEntered event Can be overridden in the subclasses

      Called when there is a mouseExited event Can be overridden in the subclasses

      Called when there is a mousePressed event Can be overridden in the subclasses
      void onMouseReleased(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Called when there is a mouseReleased event Can be overridden in the subclasses
      void onMouseWheelMoved(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      Called when there is a mouseWheelMoved event Can be overridden in the subclasses
      private void redispatchToMainFrame(java.awt.event.MouseEvent e)
      If reDispatch is equal to true every mouseListener and mouseMotionListener of the main frame is updated with the right event
      static void setMAIN_FRAME(javax.swing.JFrame FRAME)
      Set the Main frame for the WindowResizer Can only be set once

    • Constructor Detail

      • MouseMovementAdapter

        public MouseMovementAdapter()
        Create an new MouseMovementAdapter that will always re-dispatch events

      • MouseMovementAdapter

        public MouseMovementAdapter(boolean redispatch)
        Create a MouseMovementAdapter where it is possible to choose whether to re-dispatch the events to the main frame or just use them as they should be by default
        Parameters:
        redispatch - true if events needs to be re-dispatched, false otherwise
